captions.text:
We're so glad to see so many of you
Iovely people here tonight.

We especially welcome
all the representatives...

of Illinois'
Iaw enforcement community...

who have chosen to ioin us here
in the Palace Hotel Ballroom.

We certainly hope
you all enjoy the show.

And remember, people,
that no matter who you are...

and what you do
to live, thrive and survive,

there's still some things
that make us all the same.
You, me, them, everybody.

- Everybody.

to love #
